• Multiplayer mining game using MQTT for real-time communication.
  • Procedurally generated map with minerals, structure building, and resource trading.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining simulation featuring real-time player interactions through MQTT technology. Players explore procedurally generated environments to collect resources and upgrade equipment at stations. The game includes physics-based mechanics like overheating limits and fall damage synchronized across participants.
